channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Investigators: Kentucky officers wounded by suspect fatally shot him after altercation
item.description: Two Kentucky police officers who were injured in a shooting fatally shot a suspect when he gained control of an officer’s weapon.

item.title: A green giant: This year’s 74-foot Rockefeller Christmas tree is en route from Massachusetts
item.description: A giant Norway spruce that will serve as this year’s Rockefeller Christmas tree is en route to New York City from its tiny Massachusetts hometown.

item.title: Rescuers respond after bus overturns on upstate New York highway
item.description: Rescue operations are underway after a bus with passengers aboard rolled over on an upstate New York highway.
